metadata.title: CVE-2021-38495 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers reported memory safety bugs present in Thunderbird78.13.0. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and wepresume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited torun arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.1 andFirefox ESR < 91.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
